episodes.title: Mask Off Singapore - New Age Scams
episodes.description:
Is this a scam? Allegations resurfaced against 'Life Coach' Hun Ming Kwang? New allegations against Goh Chew Hui? What is ThisConnect.Today, Clean Your Toilet Podcast, Freedom Pathways Work, Threading Worlds books, Hunny and Lummy, Divine Mastery Retreat, Healing the Cracks, and Pinnacle Mastery Institute, all dubious brands and entities created by the same person? I'll try to give you an explanation on the potential scam of inner works, life coaching, new age frauds, and processwork, as well as some of the legal problems they are facing. I don't even talk about the rampant cultural appropriation. By the end of this video, maybe you'll say, "Oh, yes, this is a scam for sure." Maybe, I cannot legally say you will say that. 

Weird video description, right? Almost like Chat GPT wrote it. But it didn't. There's a reason why it's so weird. It's a very smart reason, I promise. Scammy scum scam. 

Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/aden_ng

Links to me:
https://bio.link/aden_ng

#innerwork #lifecoach #newage #scams #debunk #skeptic

episodes.title: The Cult of Singapore (A Documentary About Self-Help Culture)
episodes.description:
The third (and hopefully final) video to a documentary and video essay series on Hun Ming Kwang and ThisConnect nobody asked for or wanted, including me. There's a joke on Tumblr about how some YouTubers got rich enough from Patreon to become investigative journalists. I might have skipped a step.

episodes.title: Forever Dangers of Self-Help Movements
episodes.description:
Update: Are you even a real YouTube video essayist if you don't get at least 1 video copyright struck by a potentially dangerous entity? And in case this gets abuse struck again, the video is licensed under Creative Commons, so you all have my permission to download this and repost it elsewhere.

This video was way too big, let's be honest. I dive into the world of self-help movements, looking at individuals like Robert Kiyosaki and Hun Ming Kwang, and groups like the ICF and ThisConnect. I hope the 12 weeks of research and risk of defamation is worth it! It's probably not. Oh look, is that a Patreon? 

Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/aden_ng
